amendment.description: To prohibit the approval of certain farmer program loans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 781 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 781 proposed by Senator Landrieu to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6650, S6650-6651; text: CR S6650) To prohibit the approval of certain farmer program loans.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 781 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 781 proposed by Senator Landrieu to Amendment SA 738.
